article_title: Spotify Kids is here to keep your children busy while you're stuck at home
article_description: If you re stuck in the house with the kids and don t know how to keep them entertained  Spotify has your back  The music streaming service launched its standalone Spotify Kids app in the U S  France  and Canada on Tuesday  This came after an extended beta pe
